metadata.Title: CVE-2018-8785 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
FreeRDP prior to version 2.0.0-rc4 contains a Heap-Based Buffer Overflow infunction zgfx_decompress() that results in a memory corruption and probablyeven a remote code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-8785` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

freerdp2-shadow-x11 - 2.0.0~git20170725.1.1648deb+dfsg1-7ubuntu0.1
freerdp2-wayland - 2.0.0~git20170725.1.1648deb+dfsg1-7ubuntu0.1
freerdp2-x11 - 2.0.0~git20170725.1.1648deb+dfsg1-7ubuntu0.1
libfreerdp-client2-2 - 2.0.0~git20170725.1.1648deb+dfsg1-7ubuntu0.1
libfreerdp-server2-2 - 2.0.0~git20170725.1.1648deb+dfsg1-7ubuntu0.1
libfreerdp-shadow-subsystem2-2 - 2.0.0~git20170725.1.1648deb+dfsg1-7ubuntu0.1
libfreerdp-shadow2-2 - 2.0.0~git20170725.1.1648deb+dfsg1-7ubuntu0.1
libfreerdp2-2 - 2.0.0~git20170725.1.1648deb+dfsg1-7ubuntu0.1
libuwac0-0 - 2.0.0~git20170725.1.1648deb+dfsg1-7ubuntu0.1
libwinpr-tools2-2 - 2.0.0~git20170725.1.1648deb+dfsg1-7ubuntu0.1
libwinpr2-2 - 2.0.0~git20170725.1.1648deb+dfsg1-7ubuntu0.1
winpr-utils - 2.0.0~git20170725.1.1648deb+dfsg1-7ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freerdp2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.0~git20170725.1.1648deb+dfsg1-7ubuntu0.1').
